name: Corepoint Health
overview:
Corepoint Health delivers software that integrates healthcare applications and connects healthcare providers together to facilitate efficient and timely patient data flow.

Corepoint Health offers two product families â€“ Corepoint Connections and Corepoint Decisions. The Corepoint Connections suite offers a proven way to integrate an application environment productively as well as exchange patient data efficiently in a healthcare community. The Corepoint Decisions suite offers unique event and operational alerting capabilities and delivers meaningful performance measurements of relevant operational data in dashboard-like views.

The Corepoint Connections suite includes the following product offerings:

(1) Corepoint Integration Engine is an integration platform designed to simplify the complexities of healthcare integration.

(2) Corepoint Community Exchange is a web services-based solution to overcome the connectivity challenges to multiple remote care locations.

The Corepoint Decisions suite includes the following product offerings:

(1) Corepoint Action Points is a real-time data alert system which enables individuals to make decisions based on the most current point-in-time information available.

(2) Corepoint Operations Monitor is a web-based, dashboard-like view of key operational data for a healthcare organization or department.
